backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining cruise deals, itineraries, bookings, reviews, branding, alerts, and shareable link data structures with storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component setting up providers, routing for shared itineraries, and rendering the full UI layout.
Component that shows toast notifications for new unviewed admin booking alerts.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboardDi: Admin dashboard dialog showing alerts, bookings, logo management, and branding settings with tabs and data loading.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettingsDia: Dialog for viewing user role, principal ID, and assigning admin privileges.
frontend/src/components/BookingModal.tsx: Modal for selecting cabins, calculating total cost, and submitting a cruise booking.
frontend/src/components/CruiseCard.tsx: Displays cruise deal details with images, favorites support, and itinerary modal access.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLineLogosM: Admin interface to add, edit, preview, and delete cruise line logos.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLinePartne: Shows partner cruise line logos with loading placeholders and fallback messaging.
Dialog listing a user's favorited cruise deals or showing empty state placeholders.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedDeals.ts: Section showing featured cruise deals in an auto-scrolling carousel with error and loading states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, social links, and a dynamic copyright section.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main header with navigation, authentication handling, admin tools, and dialogs for favorites and bookings.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the homepage hero section with promotional text, action buttons, and feature highlights.
Shows a detailed cruise itinerary in a dialog with tabs, reviews, booking, sharing, and PDF generation features.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Handles displaying, creating, editing, and deleting cruise reviews with star ratings.
frontend/src/components/SearchSection.ts: Search UI for cruises with text search, filters, and results display using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/SharedItineraryP: Displays a shared itinerary with branding, images, ship specs, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/components/SharedPageBrandi: Admin tab for editing and resetting shared page branding settings with form state and API updates.
frontend/src/components/UserBookingsDial: Dialog showing a user's bookings with status, dates, and itinerary details using query hooks.
frontend/src/config/footerSocialLinks.ts: Exports preset social media profile links for the site footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, identity loading, and related state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating cruise deals, itineraries, user profiles, and related data via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for themes, including ocean and sunset color palettes and dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/colorValidation.ts: Provides utilities to validate color strings and return safe color styles or fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/itineraryPdf.ts: Generates a printable PDF-like itinerary by opening a new window and injecting styled HTML content.
frontend/src/utils/sharedItineraryBrandi: Defines default branding and merges backend branding settings with fallback values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and managing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes with custom color variables, ocean/sunset palettes, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing features with their IDs, descriptions, and requirement links. Primarily serves as the canonical state and feature registry for the project.
